name: ogecko
description: A pure, simple and responsive Hexo theme for documenting technical information eg architecture, design, api, and process. Inspired by the [Meteor Guide](https://guide.meteor.com/) and [API Docs](http://docs.meteor.com/).

scripts.semantic: cd semantic && rm -rf dist && gulp build && cp dist/*.min.* ../source/style && cp -r dist/themes/default ../source/style/themes/default
